name: Thesis escape rooms prototype (Version 1)
description:
This Twine made game is a prototype made as part of my thesis for my game writing bachelors degree. At the start of the game you will get the basic information about the game and at the end of the game there will be a link to a survey which will hold more information. You can only answer the survey once so if you can't answer a particular survey, you have completed that version of the prototype!

Check the Devlog for updates!
